PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01272018-02-12ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to add natural gas condensates to Schedule 1 of Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 (CEPA) and to enable the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Health to propose risk management measures under the CEPA, should such measures be deemed necessary to manage environmental risks associated with natural gas condensates.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0020 Publication Date: 2018-02-21
AttachmentsAttachment
